# Variables

Variables from source data files are converted and harmonized to following variables:

- 1x1 degree coordinate grid
  - lon: 0.5 to 359.5°E longitude (in °E)
  - lat: -89.5 to 89.5°N latitude (in °N)
- depth: water depth in m
- bottomdepth: bottomdepth in m
- Cant: anthropogenic CO~2~ in umol kg-1

# Data sets / objects

# Chunk labels

- read_xxx: open new data set
- clean_xxx: subset rows of a data set
- write_xxx: write summarized data file to disk

# Folder structure

- data: contains all data, not synced to Github
  - subfolder for each data product
    - _summarized_data_files: data sets created along analysis
